lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The decline in intended soybean acreage and lower stocks are "the first report we've had for a long time that shows any optimism for anybody," said John "Bud" Frazier, grain analyst and executive vice president for Balfour MacLaine, Inc.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Frazier was joined by Susan Hackmann, senior grain analyst with AgriAnalysis, and Mark Meyer, a grain analyst with Shearson Lehman Brothers, Inc., on a Chicago Board of Trade panel to discuss the reports.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We're seeing low prices generate some interest in demand," said Meyer, adding that feed use was up 13 pct last quarter and 15 pct in the preceding quarter.
